title: America’s Favorite Pastime & Cigars
itunes:title: America’s Favorite Pastime & Cigars
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… Did we see into the future? We had this show scheduled for months and Baseball has reached a labor agreement. We welcome Radhames “Ram” Rodriguez from El Artista Cigars to the show as we talk about America’s favorite pastime & cigars!

In the first hour we light up arguably the best cigar with athlete ties… Big Papi The Slugger from David Ortiz while on deck for the second hour is the Stadium Series I, a cigar made by Asylum exclusively for United Cigars.

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Cigar News, The email of the week and a peek into the Asylum.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
